price: 99. Dheh: Ehlul-Kitaabow (Yuhuud iyo Nasaaroy)! Maxaad uga hor istaagtaan Jidka Alle kan rumeysan? Waxaad rabtaan (inaad ka dhigtaan) mid qalloocan, idinkoo marag ka ah? Allena ma mooga waxaad fashaan.
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ مَنۡ ءَامَنَ تَبۡغُونَهَا عِوَجٗا وَأَنتُمۡ شُهَدَآءُۗ وَمَا ٱللَّهُ بِغَٰفِلٍ عَمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul yāahla al-kitābi lima taṣuddūna ʿan sabīli al-lahi man āmana tabghūnahā ʿiwajan wa-antum shuhadāu wamā al-lahu bighāfilin ʿammā taʿmalūna
